selectedProjectDesc: Cuatro Cuatros is a Product Design Studio from Valencia (SP). This website was designed by Cuatro Cuatros and developed by me in Wordpress.

Crude is an e-commerce project for an all-gender jewelry brand. This project involved the user experience and user interface (UX/UI) design followed by the development of an online sales platform with WooCommerce and WordPress.
Project developed with React that provides quotes from famous people with data obtained from an API.
Development of a Pokédex with data obtained from the public API PokéAPI. [This is a work in progress]
